# this workflow will download the artifacts

name: Artifacts Demo

on: [push]

jobs: 
  welcome-06:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps: 
      - name: First Step 
        run: echo "This will be triggered manually!!!!"

      - name: Create IP file
        run: echo "192.168.1.1" > ec2_ip.txt

      - name: Upload artifacts
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: ec2-ip
          path: ec2_ip.txt
